data.title: spatio
data.text: excellent food, great service, excellent drinks. nice sitting outside listening to some live music. highly recommend

data.title: Not a very pleasant meal
data.text: Have been here before and had liked the food and service. On a recent visit, however, we were deeply disturbed by one of the employees. Not sure if he was a manager or owner, but he chewed out a waitress in front of other employees and customers. I felt so sorry for her, it really ruined our meal and evening. She didn't do anything wrong, and he acted like it was perfectly normal to chastise a waitress in front of other people. Won't be returning there ever again.

data.title: Spats fries for the WIN!
data.text: You must get the spats fries. Although the crinkle cuts are good, the spats are way tastier and have a delicious seasoning. The smell of the restaurant was a little "elderly", but you get used to it.

data.title: Love the Unique Menu items
data.text: This is a place with very good tasting food however do not go if you are expecting fast service. Also, the bartender and wait staff tend to slam the refrigerators behind the bar which startled me frequently during our meal and waiting for food. Most unpleasant way to dine and spend a night out with a significant other.

data.title: Our favorite place in town!
data.text: Spats is by far our favorite place in town! The food is always great and they offer great weekend specials that are far beyond what you would expect. They have a couple of their own brews on tap as well as a couple wisconsin beers. The bar tenders are nice and the waitstaff is friendly. A seat in a booth or on the patio is worth waiting for instead of sitting in the back area which is a bit closed off from the charm of the rest of the place.

data.title: Reminded of a neighborhood bar/eatery......
data.text: I found Spats to be very cozy and laid back. I met a long time friend and we were able to sit and chat while enjoying beverages for hours.  We decided to grab a bite to eat and I had a SPATS Burger. It was delicious and SPATS uses only the best ingredients which make each element of the burger delicious on its own. It was a very large burger and very reasonable priced. Their is patio seating and I liked the cozy feel of the place as it is located in what some might call an urban jungle. I look forward to coming back to SPATS.

data.title: Great place for a quick dinner
data.text: We were in town for a family function. 5 adults and 2 kids stopped by here for a quick dinner. Great sandwiches and appetizers. Very good local beers as well! Nice atmosphere. Location was not crowded at all. Service was as great as the food. Not too expensive. I would definitely recommend this location!

data.title: Great "Google Maps" find!
data.text: We were driving through Appleton and wanted a place to stay. The restaurant had an ad in our hotel's info booklet, so we decided to try it out. I thought I'd go small and get a burger (it was huge but delicious) and my mom and aunt got the fish dinner (I believe it was haddock or similar). Try the cheese curds too- Wisconsin has the best!  Our waitress was awesome- very personable and knowledgeable about the menu. We left with full stomachs and 2 to-go boxes! It was a great find... very impressed!

data.title: Laid back, Easy Going Bar & Grill!
data.text:
This little gem is casual & laid back and has a good selection of beers & cocktails to choose from. Check the web site's calendar for evening events. Definitely sit outside on the patio if it's not too hot a summer evening; friendly people visit between the tables.  Starters: Cheese curds were a little heavy on the breading but definitely tasty. Entre's: the Spatz Burger, medium rare with Thousand Island Dressing is wonderful - very much like CA's "In & Out Burger"; Mushrooms & Swiss Burger another marvelous combination, the Billy Burger has it all and the Reuben Sandwich - a classic! 
Don't forget the Sweet Potato Fries.

data.title: Great food and service!
data.text: I've eaten at Spats twice in the last few weeks. Both meals was very tasty and the service was top-notch! We ate in a booth by the bar and also in the back dining room. I would recommend the Herbie burger! Not the healthiest but so good. They have a nice selection of local and regional brews on tap. I also had a nightly special. This night it was chicken breasts marinated in a BBQ sauce with sweet potato chunks. I ordered the carrot curry soup as my side and it was delicious. The little loaf of multi-grained bread was a great accompaniment. Can't wait until it warms up so we can enjoy patio dining.

data.title: Awesome Find!
data.text:
We chose Spats from a brochure at our hotel.  It seemed to be a "hidden gem" of Appleton!  My mom had a steak, my sister had coconut shrimp, and I had chicken tenders.  They all were delicious.  Service was friendly and fast.  Atmosphere in the booths was on the darker side and would be nice for a date, or a girls night like us!

My ONLY complaint is that when the blender is running (for drinks) it was hard to talk and hear each other.

Would love to return in warmer weather to sit on the "Spat-io."

data.title: Sunday Brunch
data.text: We stopped for Sunday Brunch while in town for a sports venue. Menu was very eclectic, and if you want alcohol for breakfast might be the right place for you. I have a veggie skillet, it was good but potatoes were served in it and one the side, too much. Toast was cold. Also had the College Avenue crawl, burger was good but not enough of the side. Both said served with fresh fruit which consisted of nothing more than an orange slice garnish. Bloody Mary was good served with a beer chaser. They were busy so we needed to ask to have our bill brought to us, wait time was about 30 minutes seated.

data.title: Hope you like fried foods
data.text:
We went with another couple on a Friday night.  We wanted a light dinner and drinks.  It was hard to find anything healthy on the menu.  Even the salad had coconut shrimp on it... Broiled fish or shrimp was not a choice at all.  Side dishes also were all fried. 
Work on the healthier menu choices.   

For drinks we ordered old fashioneds, a Wisconsin staple.  They were so-so. The bartender was friendly. 

Service was not so good.  We came after the Friday rush, so the server told us they were out of some offerings.  She forgot to give us waters when we asked, gave my friend the wrong kind of fish.  My husband and I just had crab cakes which were deep fried crab cake balls.

data.title: Amazing Food & Drink options!
data.text: Right on the Ave you can't ask for a better location. Starting the night off with some drinks and a great dinner at Spats you can't go wrong. My new favorite is the Sunday brunch. They have some of the craziest bloody merry options that you can't pass up! If you are in Wisconsin Spats is a must!

data.title: Great Food!
data.text: The food here is very tasty. They have an extensive menu and have great specials also. The service was quick and the staff checked back often to see if we needed anything.

data.title: Casual Dining, Excellent Eats
data.text: The owners of this place really care about their customers. They not only walk around the place but they come by afterwards to see how the food was. You can order anything from salads to Fresh fish specials.

data.title: Great local restaurant
data.text: We were in town for the EAA Oshkosh Airshow and went looking for a place close to our hotel...the food and service was so good we went back the second night! We wish it was closer for a visit this weekend.

data.title: Just average
data.text: Dinner here was nothing but average.  Possibly we came on an off night for service and food. We didn't finish half our meals as it was just bland.  We might give another shot from all the good reviews here.

data.title: Always good!
data.text: We go there frequently and the service is always good.  The waitresses are always friendly!  They have good prices!

data.title: Not open according to hours stated on door.
data.text: Tried to eat here during Appleton Restaurant week but was closed during the stated OPEN hour I was there.  Very disappointed.
